title: Darkwing Duck, Vol. 2: Crisis on Infinite Darkwings
description: Having successfully stopped Quackwerk's corporation's evil CEO from subjugating his beloved city of St. Canard, Darkwing Duck returns to full-time superhero action... only to face a crazed contingent of cunning clones! We've seen St. Canard without a Darkwing Duck... but how will the city cope when it's overrun with Darkwings? And what do villains Negaduck and Magica De Spell have to do with this diabolical design? Written by Aaron Sparrow and Ian Brill with amazing art by James Silvani, this is one Darkwing Duck adventure you won't want to miss!
author: Ian Brill
